Detailed Description

CPuzzleNodeArtist.

Description: This class is responsible for painting nodes to the canvas on the screen.

Limitations: None

CPuzzleNodeArtist::drawArrow.

Description: This function draws an arrow indicating a start node.

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
An arrow is drawn on the screen indicating the start node.
Parameters:
painter,: This is a pointer to the QPainter object which draws the arrow to the screen.
boundingRect,: This is the bounding rectangle of the node which is the start node.
angleNorthOfEast,: This is the angle in degrees from the East direction going North to draw the arrow at.
Limitations: None

None
Postcondition:
The given node is painted to the screen.
